name: RCOG World Congress 2024
content: A collaborative global event between the RCOG and the Omani Society of Obstetrics and Gynaecology (OSOG) The RCOGâ€™s flagship event in 2024 offers O&G professionals from around the world the opportunity to learn about the latest developments in a variety of specialties over three days. The event will be held in the capital of the Sultanate, Muscat, at the premier meetings and conference venue, Oman Convention and Exhibition Centre. With pristine beaches, magnificent deserts, rugged mountains and a history that spans over 7,000 years, the Sultanate of Oman is a breathtaking destination. Delegates will have the opportunity to experience Oman, its rich heritage and architectural treasures with cities blending the ancient and modern.
